Class ROIListData

      • saveTo

        public void saveTo(Path storageFilePath,
                   String name,
                   boolean forceName)
        Description copied from interface: JIPipeData
        Saves the data to a folder
        Specified by:
        saveTo in interface JIPipeData
        Parameters:
        storageFilePath - A folder that already exists
        name - A name reference that can be used to generate filename(s)
        forceName - If enabled, the data is saved potentially destructively. Generated files must always contain the name parameter. This is used to collect results for humans or other algorithms.

        public ij.ImagePlus toMask(Margin imageArea,
                           boolean drawOutline,
                           boolean drawFilledOutline,
                           int lineThickness)
        Generates a mask image from pure ROI data. The ROI's reference images are ignored.
        Parameters:
        imageArea - modifications for the image area
        drawOutline - whether to draw an outline
        drawFilledOutline - whether to fill the area
        lineThickness - line thickness for drawing
        Returns:
        the image

        Draws the ROI over an existing mask image
        Parameters:
        drawOutline - whether to draw an outline
        drawFilledOutline - whether to fill the area
        lineThickness - line thickness for drawing
        result - the target image

                         boolean close)
        Adds a rectangular ROI
        Parameters:

        close - if thew polygon should be closed

      • outline

        public void outline(RoiOutline outline)
        Outlines all Roi in this list by the specified algorithm. All Roi are replaced by their outline.
        Parameters:
        outline - the method

      • splitAll

        public void splitAll()
        Splits all ShapeRoi that consist of multiple sub-Roi into their individual sub-Roi. The original ShapeRoi is removed.

      • getBounds

        public Rectangle getBounds()
        Returns the bounds of area described by the Roi
        Returns:
        the bounds. if no Roi are present, a Rectangle with zero size is returned

      • logicalOr

        public void logicalOr()
        Applies a logical OR operation to all Roi in this list. This means that all Roi are combined into a single Roi

      • logicalAnd

        public void logicalAnd()
        Applies a logical AND operation to all Roi in this list. This means that the output is one Roi containing the intersection.

      • logicalXor

        public void logicalXor()
        Applies a logical XOR operation on the list of Roi.

      • containsOnlyRoisOfType

        public boolean containsOnlyRoisOfType(int type)
        Returns if this ROI list only contains ROI of given type
        Parameters:
        type - the ROI type. Can be RECTANGLE=0, OVAL=1, POLYGON=2, FREEROI=3, TRACED_ROI=4, LINE=5, POLYLINE=6, FREELINE=7, ANGLE=8, COMPOSITE=9, or POINT=10
        Returns:
        if this ROI list only contains ROI of given type

      • countRoisOfType

        public int countRoisOfType(int type)
        Counts all ROIs of given type
        Parameters:
        type - the ROI type. Can be RECTANGLE=0, OVAL=1, POLYGON=2, FREEROI=3, TRACED_ROI=4, LINE=5, POLYLINE=6, FREELINE=7, ANGLE=8, COMPOSITE=9, or POINT=10
        Returns:
        number of ROI with type Roi.POINT

                                ImageStatisticsSetParameter measurements)
        Generates ROI statistics
        Parameters:
        imp - the reference image
        measurements - which measurements to extract
        Returns:
